item.title: Cert Chain for a multi-domain Comondo Positive SSL
item.description: 1cat AddTrustExternalCARoot.crt COMODORSAAddTrustCA.crt COMODORSADomainValidationSecureServerCA.crt >> cert-chain.pem NOTE: This is the inverse of "Creating an SSL Bundle out of Comodo Positive SSL" which seems valid as well. Not sure if it's valid in any order.
